author: Amanda Pilkington

review: I just love it. It is very easy to use and works every time
author: AE

review: Can't say enough great things about the chromecast.  We have one for all of our TVs.  you can't beat the convenience it offers.  we probably get 90% of our media from either Netflix, or by streaming local files via Plex, and the chromecast gives me what I want, on the TV I want, all with a push of a button on my phone.  You can also cast from your computer, which comes in handy, but it's so great being able to control everything from your phone.  It will even turn the TV on when you connect to it, which is a great feature.  It's a great little gadget, and the fact that it's so cheap makes it even better.
author: Luke

review: Works beautifully for receiving programs and videos from my phone or laptop.
author: Carl L. Young III

review: Exactly what I as looking for.
